channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (6 May 2016)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-05-06/#comment-454">Leland Fiegel</a>.
My pleasure, Leland. Always looking to shout about great Genesis stuff.
If you're interested you can now register on this site to directly post up any new Genesis themes, articles etc you produce in future: http://genesiswp.guide/register
Look forward to keeping up with what you're doing!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Leland Fiegel.

My pleasure, Leland. Always looking to shout about great Genesis stuff.

If you’re interested you can now register on this site to directly post up any new Genesis themes, articles etc you produce in future: http://genesiswp.guide/register

Look forward to keeping up with what you’re doing!

item.title: By: Leland Fiegel
item.dc:creator: Leland Fiegel
item.description: Thanks once again for spreading the word about the Milan Pro theme! We're pretty excited about the response thus far.
item.content:encoded: Thanks once again for spreading the word about the Milan Pro theme! We’re pretty excited about the response thus far.
